name: test_saml_auth
description:
arrange: given charm in its initial state
    act: configure a SAML target url and fire SAML authentication
    assert: The SAML authentication process is executed successfully.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: given charm in its initial state
act: configure a SAML target url and fire SAML authentication
assert: The SAML authentication process is executed successfully.
